titleStmt.title: The Christian conflict and conquest set forth in a sermon at Pauls-crosse, upon Sunday the 19th of Iuly, 1635. By W.E.B.D. of St Mary Hall in Oxford
titleStmt.author: Evans, William, b. 1598 or 9.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Leonard Lichfield, and are to be sold by William Webb,

notesStmt.note: W.E. = William Evans. To the reader signed: William Evans.
